author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: Anti-Semitic Attacks Surged in New York Last Year
text:
Anti-Semitic incidents in New York City increased 92% in 2017, according to a new Anti-Defamation League report, which also found that more than half of all anti-Semitic assaults in the country occurred in New York state. 
The Jewish advocacy organization recorded 234 incidents in the city, up from 122 in the prior year, according to the report released Tuesday. The data include criminal complaints, as well as reports made directly to the organization, of harassment, assaults, school incidents or vandalism.
